channel.title: 'OR' In a script
channel.description:
Well, Im making a script without any use, just for fun. But anyways, I ran into a problem that is easy to solve I guess. I need the folowing procedure to work:
[code] Procedure find; var x, y : integer; begin if findcolor( x, y, cc1, 0, 0, 515, 337) or if findcolor( x, y, cc2, 0, 0, 515, 337) or if findcolor( x, y, cc3, 0, 0, 515, 337) or if findcolor( x, y, cc4, 0, 0, 515, 337) then writeln('lol'); end; [/code]
But the problem is, I get this error: [code] Line 12: [Error] (12:45): Syntax error in script [/code]
Simply said, how do I use 'OR' in a script? Thanks in advance

item.title: 'OR' In a script
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Think of or as orif, in java there is no elseif but in SCAR there is.

Read full topic

item.title: 'OR' In a script
item.dc:creator: @Janilabo Janilabo
item.description:
@Janilabo wrote:

You don’t need all those if’s. Only 1 if and 1 then for if…then.

Here:

procedure Find; var x, y: Integer; begin if(FindColor(x, y, cc1, 0, 0, 515, 337))or (FindColor(x, y, cc2, 0, 0, 515, 337))or (FindColor(x, y, cc3, 0, 0, 515, 337))or (FindColor(x, y, cc4, 0, 0, 515, 337))then WriteLn('LOL'); end;

-> The extra if’s caused the Syntax error.

Read full topic

item.title: 'OR' In a script
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

Well, Im making a script without any use, just for fun. But anyways, I ran into a problem that is easy to solve I guess. I need the folowing procedure to work:

Procedure find;
var x, y : integer;
begin
if findcolor( x, y, cc1, 0, 0, 515, 337) or
if findcolor( x, y, cc2, 0, 0, 515, 337) or
if findcolor( x, y, cc3, 0, 0, 515, 337) or
if findcolor( x, y, cc4, 0, 0, 515, 337) then
writeln('lol');
end;

But the problem is, I get this error:

Line 12: [Error] (12:45): Syntax error in script

Simply said, how do I use ‘OR’ in a script? Thanks in advance

Read full topic
